quiz.text:

quiz.text: As per recent (Dec 2022) news, _________ has become the first bank to offer real estate specific STACK service which enables participants of the real estate sector including builders, Real Estate Investment Trusts (REITs) and Alternate Investment Funds (AIFs) to undertake banking transactions efficiently.
